titleStmt.title: Incestuous marriages, or, relations of consanguinity and affinity hindering and dissolving marriage, as making all marriages within such relations to be incestuous, and all children begotten of such marriages to be illegitimate, or bastards to all intents and purposes

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Pawlet at the Bible in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine, London.
